columns.name: client_vpn_endpoint_id
columns.description: The ID of the client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: transport_protocol
columns.description: The transport protocol.

columns.name: client_cidr_block
columns.description: The IPv4 address range, in CIDR notation, from which client IP addresses are assigned.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The date and time when the Client VPN endpoint was created.

columns.name: deletion_time
columns.description: The date and time when the Client VPN endpoint was deleted.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A brief description of the endpoint.

columns.name: dns_name
columns.description: The DNS name to be used by clients when connecting to the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: self_service_portal_url
columns.description: The URL of the self-service portal.

columns.name: server_certificate_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the server certificate.

columns.name: session_timeout_hours
columns.description: The maximum VPN session duration time in hours. Valid values: 8, 10, 12, 24. Defaults to 24.

columns.name: split_tunnel
columns.description: Indicates whether split-tunnel is enabled in the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC.

columns.name: vpn_port
columns.description: The port number for the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: authentication_options
columns.description: Information about the authentication method used by the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: client_connect_options
columns.description: The options for managing connection authorization for new client connections.

columns.name: connection_log_options
columns.description: Information about the client connection logging options for the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: client_login_banner_options
columns.description: Options for enabling a customizable text banner that will be displayed on Amazon Web Services provided clients when a VPN session is established.

columns.name: dns_servers
columns.description: Information about the DNS servers to be used for DNS resolution.

columns.name: security_group_ids
columns.description: The IDs of the security groups for the target network.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current state of the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: Any tags assigned to the Client VPN endpoint.

columns.name: vpn_protocol
columns.description: The protocol used by the VPN session.
